summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mobile-First Workout Analysis redesign. Backend API (13/13 tests passed) and Frontend UI tests passed. All features working correctly with real Strava data and EN/FR bilingual support.
passed_tests: GET /api/coach/workout-analysis/{workout_id} returns 200 with correct response structure
coach_summary is concise (single sentence, max 20 words)
intensity card contains pace, avg_hr, and label (above_usual/below_usual/normal)
load card contains distance_km, duration_min, vs_baseline_pct, direction
comparison card contains pace_delta and hr_delta vs baseline
insight field contains max 2 sentences of coach observation
guidance field contains optional recovery suggestion
French language parameter returns French content (coach_summary, insight, guidance)
Non-existent workout returns 404
workout_id is included in response
Workout detail endpoint returns real Strava data
WorkoutDetail page loads with coach summary at top
Intensity card displays pace (7:19/km), avg HR (128 bpm), label (Above usual)
Load card displays distance (8.2 km), duration (1h), vs baseline (+51%)
Comparison card displays HR delta (+9 bpm)
Coach Note section displays insight text
Guidance section displays recovery suggestion
View full analysis button navigates to /coach and triggers deep analysis
Ask the coach button navigates to /coach
French translations work correctly (Intensité, Charge, vs Référence, Note Coach, etc.)
Mobile layout is readable (page height 954px, only 1.1 scrolls needed)
Good text contrast (dark bg rgb(5,5,5), light text rgb(237,237,237))
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation between signal calculation and AI generation
i18n translations are complete for both EN and FR in analysis section
data-testid attributes properly added for coach-summary, coach-insight, guidance, deep-analysis-btn, ask-coach-btn
Mobile-first design is well implemented with minimal scrolling required
seed_data_creation: None - using real Strava data synced from user's account (workout ID: strava_17130033093)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile-First Workout Analysis feature is complete and working. Uses GPT-5.2 via EMERGENT_LLM_KEY for AI-generated coach summary, insight, and guidance. Real Strava data is available in MongoDB (119 workouts synced). The workout analysis compares current workout to 14-day baseline of same type. Signal cards show Intensity (pace, HR, label), Load (distance, duration, vs baseline %), and Comparison (pace delta, HR delta). French translations are complete. View full analysis button navigates to /coach?analyze={id} which triggers deep analysis.
mocked_api_note: NO MOCKED APIs - using real Strava data synced from user's account. AI (GPT-5.2) generates real coach summaries and insights based on actual workout data.
